mapper.insert: insert into stay (stayno, memberid, stayname, stayloc, stayadress , stayinfo, staytype, badge, mainpic1, mainpic2, latitude, longitude) values (stayseq.nextval, #{memberId}, #{stayName}, #{stayLoc}, #{stayAdress} ,#{stayInfo}, #{stayType}, #{badge}, #{mainPic1}, #{mainPic2}, #{latitude}, #{longitude})

select roomseq.nextval from dual
insert into room (roomno, stayno, roomname, stdperson , overperson, roominfo, price, roomtype, info) values (#{roomNo}, #{stayNo}, #{roomName}, #{stdPerson} , #{overPerson}, #{roomInfo}, #{price}, #{roomType}, #{info})

insert into roomoptionyn (roomno, stayno, bathroom, kitchen, parking , babiqu, pet, terrace, pool, viewRoom, bed) values (#{roomNo}, #{stayNo}, #{bathroom}, #{kitchen}, #{parking} , #{babiqu}, #{pet}, #{terrace}, #{pool}, #{viewRoom}, #{bed})
